item.title: Chair and trolley dumped, 14th June

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bonita Mews, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Woodside Crescent rubble, 14th June
item.description:
The state of this road is an absolute disgrace especially as it surrounds a school. The road is full of potholes and rubble causing damage to cars and potentially people as cars try to avoid the obstacles! Bedford Rd. was recently relayed, why can’t we have the same, not just patchwork that doesn’t last!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Woodside Crescent, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Give way sign missing at intersection, 14th June
item.description:
The give way sign at the junction of Glanville Road and Woldham Road was knocked down in a car accident on 19th May and still hasn't been replaced. Please can this be expedited as this junction has frequent accidents when drivers go straight over the junction, so risks further accidents until it is replaced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glanville Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog waste bin, 14th June
item.description:
Three weeks since this dog waste bin on Commonwealth Way has been emptied and yet according to RBG it’s on a weekly schedule… clearly not. Please sort this out… it stinks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Suffolk Place, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nuisance smell, 14th June
item.description:
Very strong/unpleasant cooking smells coming from restaurant at 16 Chatsworth Road. restuarant appears to have no proper extraction. smells strong all around the street area and around the corner into Clifden Road (which the restarant backs on to
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
